quote: Some fight for honor, some fight for glory. It matters only that you fight.
_chk2m: This table is used to automatically complete skindb's skins

quote: Human emotions can be more volatile than even the deepest magic.
_chk2m: Two infos are used: the champions description and quotes (atm quotes are not used).

quote: The Fist of Shadow strikes from the cover of death itself. Do not impede the balance.
Nothing can hold me back!
Solitude can be lonelier than death.
I am the fury of the blizzard, the bite of the wind, and the cold of the ice. I am the Freljord.
I never play with matches.
One tribe, one people, one Freljord.
Cower. Worship. Marvel. They are all appropriate responses.
Shurima was once the glory of Runeterra. I will make it so again.
The chimes of his footsteps are echoes of change.
A SINGLE GEAR TURNING CAN MAKE ALL THE DIFFERENCE.
This place will burn, not by cinder flying or breath of wind, but by the vengeance of my hand.
Today, we fight as enemies. Tomorrow, we may fight as brothers.
To be the best hunter, you have to be able to think like your prey.
Precision is the difference between a butcher and a surgeon.
There is no antidote for me.
Your souls will feed the Void!
Death from above!
A united Noxus could control the world - and would deserve to.
I am the light coursing in the soul of the moon.
Mundo will let you know upfront: this probably hurt very much.
The best is wherever I decide to set the bar each day.
My devices work best when they don’t work as intended… which is most of the time.
Beauty is power too, and can strike swifter than any sword.
What are you doing tonight? How about we get together and unlock that vast well of torment inside you?
Undiscovered treasures? Deadly curses? Preposterous odds? Sign me up.
No weapon cuts deeper than fear.
I have come to kill you for the sake of honor. And though you possess none, still you die.
Fizz makes even the saltiest sailors of Bilgewater look like drunken landlubbers in a fight. Good thing he's on our side.
Get behind me, Demacian! You may not have noticed, but I’m very large.
I was cutting throats and sinking Noxian war galleys when you were still pissing your britches, boy. You don’t want to take me on.
This kingdom, and its people, have given me everything. What kind of man would I be if I gave any less in return?
Gnar!
Now this'll put hair on your chest!
We’re here for your gold, not your heads, so don’t nobody decide to be a hero.
Break their ranks and ride them down without mercy. Crush the living and feast on their terror.
Impossible, you say? Nonsense. Just wait till you see my calculations!
Wisdom is frequently a kick in the head.
The sword flourishes, as though painting with blood.
The cleverness of mushrooms always surprises me.
Do not fear the winds of change – they will always be at your back.
Words may make a ruler, but only actions make history.
Who wants a piece of the champ?
Picking a fight with me is the dumbest thing you’ve done today – and that’s saying a lot.
Art requires a certain… cruelty.
Volatile explosives are a girl’s best friend!
When wronged, we seek justice. When hurt, we strike back. When betrayed, the Spear of Vengeance strikes!
Your spirit is something no one can take from you. Use it wisely.
Death is not the end of the journey, it is just the beginning...
The balance of power must be preserved.
Never question my loyalty. You will never know what I endure for it.
Justice comes on swift wings.
The child is gone. The killer remains.
The whole world's a river, and I'm its king.
The Heart of the Tempest beats eternal...and those beaten remember eternally.
Kill. Consume. Adapt.
- Tell me again, little Lamb, which things are ours to take? - All things, dear Wolf.
A sane man would run… but I ain’t the runnin’ kind!
If that's just hungry, I don't want to see angry.
The world is very different for those who cannot see beyond what is placed before their very eyes.
The actions of one may sunder the world, but the efforts of many may rebuild it.
If you would shine like a sun, first you must burn like one.
Close your eyes and let the cold take you.
Be grateful. By slaying you now, I spare you an eternity of torment.
The best path between two points is upside-down, between, then inside-out and round again.
The light inside is what makes me different, and I’m always careful where I shine it.
Beware, minions of chaos! The Shard of the Monolith has come.
The land may melt, the sea may swell, the sky may fall... but They will come.
All around me are empty husks, soulless and unafraid... but I will bring them fear.
The edge of the sharpest blade is no match for the calm of the peaceful mind.
The bigger the risk, the bigger the bounty.
All things must die… and yet I live on.
There is no rest while Kayle's brand of tyranny still exists.
I decide what the tide will bring.
What was fallen will be great again.
When consumed by utter darkness, there is nothing left but forward.
The untamed know no fear.
The darkness is closing in… it’s pitch black now… but I can still see him…
Willump and I have a whole world to explore. Don't get in our way!
When you meet your ancestors, tell them Olaf sent you.
When a moth emerges from its chrysalis, does it remember its life as a caterpillar?
I have said enough.
Bring forth one true champion, or a hundred more like you, and then we shall have a battle that will be spoken of until the end of time.
I’m no hero. Just a yordle with a hammer.
Most soldiers only rely on their weapons. Few truly rely on each other.
I got freedom. I got a lady. I got a cause I'd die for.
OK.
Fear not ambush from the hills, nor winged beasts from the skies. The true terror of Shurima comes from the sand, and gives no warning of her presence.
Blood and vengeance.
Prey on the weak and you may survive. Prey on the strong and you will truly live.
There is a place between war and murder in which our demons lurk.
Ugh, it's gonna take forever to scrape your face off my suit!
Take care with this world. What is made can be unmade.
I was cut from the ice, shaped in the storms, hardened in the cold.
Whatever you do, don't tell him you missed the punch line.
The Eye is blind to fear, to hate, to love – to all things that would sway equilibrium.
I am of two worlds, yet I belong to neither.
You mustn’t die yet; I have far too much to learn from your fragile anatomy.
War is eternal… as am I.
Coin may buy you skill for a day, but never loyalty.
We are one. We cannot be shattered.
Her melody moves the soul, her silence sunders the body.
The cruelty of one will not blind me to the suffering of many.
If you haven't yet lost the ability to ask, you may not yet ask for relief.
You didn’t destroy us all. And that mistake will be your undoing.
Power belongs to those who can wield it.
This world is a tapestry of our own making.
The three deadliest blademasters in all of Valoran are bound to the house of Du Couteau: my father, myself, and Talon. Challenge us, if you dare.
The best weapons are beautiful.
Teemo rides a thin line between chipper compatriot and unrepentant killer, but there's no one else I'd rather have as a friend.
The mind is a wondrous thing to tear apart.
Boomer says hi.
Outsmart anyone you can't beat, and beat anyone you can't outsmart.
Rage is my weapon.
It's not gambling if you can't lose...
They threw this away? But it’s so shiny!
Through us, nature's will is done.
There is only one way to measure a man. Tear him… into… pieces.
I don’t kill creatures like you because it’s the right thing to do. I kill you because I enjoy it.
Who says evil needs to come in a fearsome-looking package?
Only by deconstruction is truth revealed.
Do you want a punch to the face or the gut? Wait, I got two fists, it can be both!
A mechanized heart never misses a beat, and never falters with emotion. So why would anyone trust their life to a fragile muscle of flesh and blood?
That which runs through you will run you through.
The Ursine cannot know peace without war.
Spill blood... draw the beast!
Just try to stop me!
Ever been stabbed by a feather?
A lifetime as a slave has prepared me for eternity as your master.
Death is inevitable, one can only avoid defeat.
The story of a sword is inked in blood.
These isles… How they scream.
The angrier you get, the more this is going to hurt...
Balance is a lie - we are the true ninjas.
Ziggs? Unpredictable, dangerous, yes yes. But quite brilliant!
There is no greater grief than for a loss that is yet to come.
Nobody has to grow up if they don't want to. Or maybe they do. I don't though.
